languages.text: {n}Идира горько усмехается.{/n} "Воистину. Обезвредили ведьму и теперь можно жить спокойно, плевать, что она там хочет? Хорошо, ваша взяла. Я послушный инструмент в ваших руках. Впрочем, разве это когда-то было иначе?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира горько усмехается.{/n} "Воистину. Обезвредили ведьму и теперь можно жить спокойно, плевать что она там хочет? Хорошо, ваша взяла. Я послушный инструмент в ваших руках. Впрочем, разве это когда-то было иначе?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira smiles bitterly.{/n} "Yeah. The witch is no longer a threat, life can go on — who cares what she wants? Fine. You've won. I'm just an obedient tool in your hands. When was it ever any other way?"
languages.original_text: {n}Идира горько усмехается.{/n} "Воистину. Обезвредили ведьму и теперь можно жить спокойно, плевать, что она там хочет? Хорошо, ваша взяла. Я послушный инструмент в ваших руках. Впрочем, разве это когда-то было иначе?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira smirks bitterly.{/n} "Yeah. The witch is no longer a threat, life can go on, and who cares what she wants. Very well. You won. I'm just an obedient tool in your hands. When was it ever any other way?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira smirks bitterly.{/n} "Yeah. The witch is no longer a threat, life can go on, and who cares what she wants. Very well. You won. I'm just an obedient tool in your hands. When was it ever any other way?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira smiles bitterly.{/n} "Yeah. The witch is no longer a threat, life can go on — who cares what she wants? Fine. You've won. I'm just an obedient tool in your hands. When was it ever any other way?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira smiles bitterly.{/n} "Yeah. The witch is no longer a threat, life can go on — who cares what she wants? Fine. You've won. I'm just an obedient tool in your hands. When was it ever any other way?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira smiles bitterly.{/n} "Yeah. The witch is no longer a threat, life can go on — who cares what she wants? Fine. You've won. I'm just an obedient tool in your hands. When was it ever any other way?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉露出了苦涩的笑容。{/n}“是啊，这个女巫已经不再是个威胁了，她也可以继续活下去了，谁又在乎她想要什么呢？很好，你赢了，我现在只是你听话的工具而已。从一开始就是这样，是吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira smiles bitterly.{/n} "Yeah. The witch is no longer a threat, life can go on — who cares what she wants? Fine. You've won. I'm just an obedient tool in your hands. When was it ever any other way?"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉露出了苦涩的笑容。{/n}“是啊，这个女巫已经不再是个威胁了，她也可以继续活下去了，谁又在乎她想要什么呢？很好，你赢了，我现在只是你听话的工具而已。从一开始就是这样，是吧？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira esboza una sonrisa amarga.{/n} «Sí. La bruja ya no es una amenaza, la vida puede seguir. ¿A quién le importa lo que quiera ella? Vale. Usted gana. Soy una herramienta obediente a sus órdenes. ¿Cuándo no ha sido así?».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira smiles bitterly.{/n} "Yeah. The witch is no longer a threat, life can go on — who cares what she wants? Fine. You've won. I'm just an obedient tool in your hands. When was it ever any other way?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira esboza una sonrisa amarga.{/n} «Sí. La bruja ya no es una amenaza, la vida puede seguir. ¿A quién le importa lo que quiera ella? Vale. Usted gana. Soy una herramienta obediente a sus órdenes. ¿Cuándo no ha sido así?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira lächelt verbittert.{/n} "Ja. Die Hexe stellt keine Gefahr mehr dar, das Leben kann weitergehen. Wen kümmert, was sie will? Schön. Ihr habt gewonnen. Ich bin nur ein gefügiges Werkzeug in Euren Händen. Wann war das jemals anders?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira smiles bitterly.{/n} "Yeah. The witch is no longer a threat, life can go on — who cares what she wants? Fine. You've won. I'm just an obedient tool in your hands. When was it ever any other way?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira lächelt verbittert.{/n} "Ja. Die Hexe stellt keine Gefahr mehr dar, das Leben kann weitergehen. Wen kümmert, was sie will? Schön. Ihr habt gewonnen. Ich bin nur ein gefügiges Werkzeug in Euren Händen. Wann war das jemals anders?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは苦笑いを浮かべた。{/n}「そうね。その魔女はもう脅威じゃないし、これからも人生は続いていく。彼女の望みなんて誰が気にするというの。いいわ、あなたの勝ちよ。あたいはあなたの従順な道具にすぎないんだし。それ以外の道なんてなかったじゃない？」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira smiles bitterly.{/n} "Yeah. The witch is no longer a threat, life can go on — who cares what she wants? Fine. You've won. I'm just an obedient tool in your hands. When was it ever any other way?"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは苦笑いを浮かべた。{/n}「そうね。その魔女はもう脅威じゃないし、これからも人生は続いていく。彼女の望みなんて誰が気にするというの。いいわ、あなたの勝ちよ。あたいはあなたの従順な道具にすぎないんだし。それ以外の道なんてなかったじゃない？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira sourit avec amertume.{/n} « Évidemment. La sorcière n'est plus une menace, la vie peut reprendre son cours... Qui se préoccupe de ce qu'elle désire vraiment ? Très bien. Vous avez gagné. Je ne serai qu'un outil docile entre vos mains. Je l'ai toujours été, de toute façon. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira smiles bitterly.{/n} "Yeah. The witch is no longer a threat, life can go on — who cares what she wants? Fine. You've won. I'm just an obedient tool in your hands. When was it ever any other way?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira sourit avec amertume.{/n} « Évidemment. La sorcière n'est plus une menace, la vie peut reprendre son cours... Qui se préoccupe de ce qu'elle désire vraiment ? Très bien. Vous avez gagné. Je ne serai qu'un outil docile entre vos mains. Je l'ai toujours été, de toute façon. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira acıyla gülümsüyor.{/n} "Evet. Cadı artık tehdit oluşturmayacak. Hayat kaldığı yerden devam edebilir. Onun ne istediği kimin umurunda? Peki. Sen kazandın. Artık elindeki itaatkâr bir aletim. Zaten hep öyle değil miydim?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira smiles bitterly.{/n} "Yeah. The witch is no longer a threat, life can go on — who cares what she wants? Fine. You've won. I'm just an obedient tool in your hands. When was it ever any other way?"

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira acıyla gülümsüyor.{/n} "Evet. Cadı artık bir tehdit oluşturmayacak, hayat devam edebilir. Onun ne istediği kimin umurunda? Peki. Sen kazandın. Artık ellerinde itaatkâr bir aletim. Zaten hep öyle değil miydim?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
